teachers.title: Our Professional Teachers
teachers.experience: Nury Barragán is a dancer and instructor with an extensive international career. Trained in artistic gymnastics, yoga, and multiple dance disciplines, she was a member of renowned companies such as the National Ballet of Colombia and performed as a soloist on stages worldwide. A three-time champion in sports aerobics, she blends art, fitness, and well-being in her teaching for all ages.
